I am having problems setting up the classpath for junit in XP. i hav 
installed juint in d:\Juint. 

i hav created a CLASSPATH variable in system variables and i hav set 
up my classpath as follows: 
setclasspath=classpath%.;d:\Junit\junit.jar

but when i try running the sample test programs i get the follwoing 
error msg: class not found "junit.sample.AllTests" 

can anyone let me know what i am doing wrong. i think that it must 
be something in my classpath setting???
